alert.note: Alert for Chaves; De Baca; Roosevelt (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 8:16PM MDT until June 03 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Roosevelt County in east central New Mexico... Southeastern De Baca County in east central New Mexico... North central Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 816 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 22 miles south of Taiban to 19 miles northeast of Mesa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Roosevelt, southeastern De Baca and north central Chaves Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
